meanings.sent1: The baronies stretched far and wide, each ruled by a noble lord.
meanings.sent2: The king granted him control over several baronies in the realm.
meanings.sent3: The baronies decided to have a picnic in the meadow to discuss important matters.
meanings.sent4: Her influence over the baronies was like a spider weaving a web of power.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the baronies was unmatched, with lush green fields and towering castles.

meanings.definition: The rank or dignity of a baron.
meanings.sent1: His baronies allowed him a seat at the royal council.
meanings.sent2: The baronies were respected for their wisdom and leadership.
meanings.sent3: The baronies threw a grand ball to celebrate their noble status.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, she held the baronies of success and innovation.
meanings.sent5: The baronies carried themselves with grace and authority, commanding respect from all.

meanings.sent1: The baronies gathered to discuss matters of war and peace.
meanings.sent2: In times of crisis, the baronies united to protect the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The baronies held a contest to see who could grow the largest pumpkin.
meanings.sent4: The baronies stood as pillars of strength in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: Legends spoke of the baronies as a force to be reckoned with, their unity unbreakable.
